## TextPropertyWidgetComponent interface

Property widget component for text.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface TextPropertyWidgetComponent extends PropertyWidgetComponentBase
```

**Extends:** [PropertyWidgetComponentBase](./obsidian-typings.propertywidgetcomponentbase.md)
